titles.title: For the relief of Vince Munoz, Governor of the Tribal Council of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo and all other enrolled members of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/15/1999--Introduced. Refers H.R. 1473 (for the relief of a named individual and enrolled members of a specified Indian tribe) to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for review.
